Description.doc:definition: Syndicated Loans - Subset of ISDA floating rate indexes.

Value.SimpleValue: Per 2006 ISDA Definitions or Annex to the 2000 ISDA Definitions, Section 7.1 Rate Options, as amended and supplemented through the date on which parties enter into the relevant transaction.
